Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Well-lit by gilt bronze chandeliers hanging overhead, this space is filled with an array of colors found in the ornate tapestries that fill the wall space in imagery of landscapes, religious scenes, and historical events. The lustrous ivory-flecked grey tile floor is covered in an ornate Persian rug in floral patterns of russet and lavender with accents of turquoise and ivory, the rainbow of hues also found in and complemented by the hangings on the walls. Silver-leaf accents cover the detailed plaster reliefs found on the ceiling panels, the light from the chandeliers glinting off the precious metal in a flickering dance of candlelight.

Well-lit by gilt bronze chandeliers hanging overhead, this space is filled with an array of colors found in the ornate tapestries that fill the wall space in imagery of landscapes, religious scenes, and historical events. The lustrous ivory-flecked grey tile floor is covered in an ornate Persian rug in floral patterns of russet and lavender with accents of turquoise and ivory, the rainbow of hues also found in and complemented by the hangings on the walls. Silver-leaf accents cover the detailed plaster reliefs found on the ceiling panels, the light from the chandeliers glinting off the precious metal in a flickering dance of candlelight.

Well-lit by gilt bronze chandeliers hanging overhead, this space is filled with an array of colors found in the ornate tapestries that fill the wall space in imagery of landscapes, religious scenes, and historical events. The lustrous ivory-flecked grey tile floor is covered in an ornate Persian rug in floral patterns of russet and lavender with accents of turquoise and ivory, the rainbow of hues also found in and complemented by the hangings on the walls. Silver-leaf accents cover the detailed plaster reliefs found on the ceiling panels, the light from the chandeliers glinting off the precious metal in a flickering dance of candlelight.
an arched double door leading north

Each side of the arched double door leading to the north is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading south

Each side of the arched double door leading to the south is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
